attributes.action: Make sure ALL PENSIONERS receive the WINTER FUEL PAYMENT
attributes.additional_details: To stop Pensioners being afraid to put their Heating on because they no longer receive the benefit any more.
attributes.background: Return the WINTER FUEL PAYMENT to all PENSIONERS

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
